channel.title: How can I stop my internet from losing connection?
channel.description: Well for 3days now I'v hosted my server 24.7 and each day my internet has went down for a period of 6hours + I called Dell and they said my internet connection was perfect. They said it could be my router. Yet I have no idea how this would do this to my router... Don't suggest 'Oh just get a cheap Dedi' . Any suggestions to my problem?

item.title: How can I stop my internet from losing connection?
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

I know but my parents perfer Belkin over every other. Belkin is all I got and I need a way to use it without all these dis connections. Could anyone at lease give me a tip how to get the internet back up after it resets? I tried a few things on troubleshoot… It likes to take its good old time restarting.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I stop my internet from losing connection?

item.title: How can I stop my internet from losing connection?
item.dc:creator: @jj_boss jj boss
item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

Belkin routers are poo ive had 1 before and it died all the time… netgear is reliable for me, keeps my server up 24/7 hope it helps

Yes Dell is a internet provider but they recommended us a new router by them. Also the router I have now is a Belkin… I switched it I forgot.
